thread.title: Netizens criticize JYJ Junsu's fan meeting packages | allkpop.com
thread.title_full: Netizens criticize JYJ Junsu's fan meeting packages | allkpop.com

title: Netizens criticize JYJ Junsu's fan meeting packages | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Netizens criticize JYJ Junsu's fan meeting packages By KpopJoA 3 minutes ago 492 19 0 0 Google+ Netizens recently compared JYJ Junsu 's fan meeting packages which were presented last April at the singer's fan meeting in Jeju Island.
The packages included packed lunch specials, as well as hotel stay Toscana's luxurious hotel for two nights and three days. The prices were as follows: $860, $740, $690 packages respectively; h owever, only the $860 package were entitled to the expensive hotel stay. 
A fan who had stayed an expensive hotel posted photos of the lunch menu, "They only provide two meals and you're on your own for the rest. On the second day, they gave us lunch box meals which tasted awful." 
Another fan posted a photo of the $690 deal for comparison. A netizen who opted for the middle package stated, "We booked a room for two, it felt more like a motel." As for the food, "It looked good on the outside, however, I only took one bite since the rice was cold. I wasn't planning on finishing it but did so for survival." 
On the other hand, there were some positive feedbacks. One person posted up photos of the food, room, and service, praising the quality of the spacious place and food. "Compared to the other hotel, it had great food and service." 
Netizens commented, "So the fan meeting cost roughly $870? Must be some gold-covered fan meeting," "$790 for a 3 day trip, were you fans satisfied?", "This is ridiculous. Are they treating fans like an ATM machine?" , and more. 
What do you think?
